name: Sweven (itch)
description:
Sweven is an adventure game in which you explore a mysterious dream world. Collect and craft different items in order to befriend its local residents and grow your little settlement. Help and be helped in return - because everyone is stronger together! The game is language independent and can be enjoyed by everyone who wants to lean back and relax.

Estimated playing time: 30-90 minutes 

Controls:
Move: WASD or arrow keys
Interact/Gather: space bar
Craft/Upgrade/Trade: Control key (CTRL/STRG)

Please be advised that CTRL in combination with WASD can be a shortcut on some browsers. If this applies to you please use the arrow keys instead.

Some general tips if you feel lost (this might include soft spoilers) :

Crystals are gained by improving the lives of yourself and others. In gameplay terms this often means building a big building, upgrading it or completing a big trade. Crystals are used for unlocking new areas by building cloud-bridges. Meeting people and building or upgrading buildings often unlocks new building options. Those are somewhere on your home island. If you feel stuck look around for a new construction site or a new area to explore.

Sweven was made in 7 days as part of Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1
